item.title: Psalm 62: God's Unique Ability to Save, Satisfy, and Sustain
item.description: The record of human history demonstrates that God does three, wonderful things for mankind: He saves; He satisfies; He sustains. Psalm 62 celebrates these wonderful truths and emphasizes God’s unique ability to provide in each area. Background According to the superscription, Psalm 62 is a psalm of David. While there is no explicit, historical context for the psalm, it refers to those who “assail a man that you may murder him” (Psalm 62:3).
